title: Will OCE ever get Twisted Treeline Flex Pick?
body:
I've been a huge fan of Threes for as long as I've Leagued for, and while I do enjoy playing the Rift with a friend in Duo, I much prefer playing in a group of 3 on Twisted Treeline.

While I haven't been able to play too much Treeline this year, the queue times for me have been really nice and quick. I get that Riot isn't pushing for Threes as a competitive environment, but I'd still like to compete against people and get a ranking for the Twisted Treeline map. I think we should treat the Treeline as its own map, rather than some random rotating game mode.

Previously, the only way to Treeline was to do it as a Ranked Team, but having Flex Pick in 3s will make it a lot easier to queue up people against equally skilled teammates. Even pairing a Solo+Duo against a Premade 3's wouldn't be too disadvantageous, because co-ordination with a smaller map and less teammates is much more efficient.

I really think OCE should have Flex Pick Treeline. While the queues are a little crowded right now (Flex, Solo/Duo, Blind Pick, ARAM, Rotating Mode), giving Treeline that chance as a competitive map and allowing it to have a queue will give players another reason to keep playing the map.

replies.body:
God i hope so, 2 less people to worry about on my team.

2 less people i have to find to fill out a team if i want to not tear my hair out.

visually more pleasing map.

Id legit give up the rift to play only tt ranked.
Or maybe just add flex q when we get given TW in the week. :))
I'm 100% for this as well. Queue times are already really nice, perhaps try testing Flex with the limited times first and then expand it to always-on ranked.
I agree, playing SR for so long and the only competitive lane is to repetitive, TW encourages skirmishes and mechanical skill

The answer is a solid maybe. We're still monitoring the health of the SR Ranked queues, but once we're confident in their stability there may be room for us to perform a test of Ranked Flex TT in our region.
If we do choose to perform such a test, we'll be updating our Queue Schedule and Preseason Ranked Queue testing posts with more info.
Bring it in part time plz <3 :^)
